summary: A house gearing towards a mage character, mainly for a second playthrough.
descriptionHtml:
Soulshot Abode:
Features:
All the skill books (To give your character a head start!)
3 Bookshelves of spell tomes
~6 Functional Bookshelves
Arcane Enchanter
Alchemy Lab
A satchel with 300 varying alchemy ingredients
Basic supplies, and necessities
Notes:
This is mod is mainly for people who, like me, make a lot of characters and want to develop them quickly. While this focuses on the mage, the skill books are for all classes.
author: Liam Farley
